attributes.action: authorise "Feel Good" exams to keep morale of students high. These exams will asking questions on popular culture, and take place within a hall of gingerbread
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Exams like this are needed to keep up the student's morale within exam season, in order to make them perform their best in these 60-120 minute windows that decide the rest of their life.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
